extension.summary: A customizable Cron timer for Kodi. It can also display notifications when your tasks run.
extension.description: Create cron timers for Kodi functions. This addon can schedule and run any built-in Kodi functions. No more reliance on add-on developers to allow for "timer" functionality, no more scripts running on other machines to send commands to your HTPC. All of your timers can now be handled directly within Kodi.
